name: GiviSoft
overview: GiviSoft is a group of web savvy and management graduates who know how to put strategies in place for building brands and companies. They work with client to develop an idea, create the blueprint, produce the code, and market the end result. Combinations of Agile and scrum methodology give an advantage when making custom websites or applications from scratch and market it to the target customers. This proven methodology ensures clients get the website or application envisioned every time. They have specialty in Internet Marketing. You can expect Best quality service in handy price.
